Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.github.nifty-gui</groupId>
  <artifactId>nifty-main</artifactId>
  <version>2.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <type>pom</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.github.nifty-gui:nifty-main:pom:2.0-SNAPSHOT'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="com.github.nifty-gui" name="nifty-main" rev="2.0-SNAPSHOT">
  <artifact name="nifty-main" type="pom" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.github.nifty-gui', module='nifty-main', version='2.0-SNAPSHOT')
)

Grails

compile 'com.github.nifty-gui:nifty-main:2.0-SNAPSHOT'

Leiningen

[com.github.nifty-gui/nifty-main "2.0-SNAPSHOT"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.github.nifty-gui" % "nifty-main" % "2.0-SNAPSHOT"
